CustomField.description: - Formula field that reflects the Additional Discount that Sales manually gave by Quote Line. - It does NOT includes the Default discount given thanks to Contract Terms Length. - The field is used in: * Page Component to show the Reasons Approval Frame or not * Process Builder "Approval Process Needed update Yes or No"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the Additional Discount percent based on the total Quote Additional Discount Percentage
CustomField.label: Addl. Disc. %
